timeline.bodyText: Logging oome would give us stacktrace. This log line is pretty useless as it is now. While beinghere, can we fix it?
timeline.author: ezaquarii

replies.bodyText: @ezaquarii what would you suggest? Simply removing the log statement and be done?
replies.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText:
And remove //} else {  do nothing just above
ThumbnailsCacheManager.java need a good refactor.
replies.author: JorisBodin

replies.bodyText: My aim is to replace this at some point by a well known lib, e.g. glide.
replies.author: tobiasKaminsky
